info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lackawanna and northeastern Luzerne Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 514 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Edwardsville, or over Wilkes-Barre, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scranton, Wilkes-Barre, Kingston, Nanticoke, Plains, Old Forge, Pittston, Taylor, Plymouth and Moosic. This includes the following highway exits... Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 159 and 185. Interstate 476 between 105 and 122. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
